# Draft:Brick Wars

Brick Wars is an upcoming action film. The film is directed, written, and produced by Josh Hollm. It was filmed with stop motion techniques and elements of traditional video completely using Lego sets and minifigures. The voice cast includes Hollm in the lead role, joined by Alex Rodriguez, Logan Roe, Steve Crawford, Ryan Nathaniel George, Alexis Harris, and Chris Smith.
The film is scheduled to be released in early 2026.
Premise
A group of special agents must work together to stop the evil Dr. Inferno from taking over Legoland. ￼
Cast
* Josh Hollm as Chase: Mission leader for the agents.
* Alex Rodriguez as Tyler: Weapons expert for the agents.
* Logan Roe as Jenna: Tech expert for the agents
* Steve Crawford as Dr. Inferno: One of the smartest people on the planet. Wants to take control of Legoland.
* Ryan Nathaniel George as Hank/Fire-Arm: Dr. Inferno's right-hand man.
* Alexis Harris as Claw-Dette: She builds all of Dr. Inferno's weapons and creations.
* Chris Smith as Commander Walker: The head of the special agents.
Production
Development
Josh Hollm first came up with the idea for an agents' film using Lego sets in 2019. He filmed a short video using sets and characters that he had at his house. Over the next few years, he kept playing around with the idea to create a larger story and the potential of what he could do. In 2025, he began writing a script for a film that would become Brick Wars.
Writing
Over the course of 2025, Hollm wrote several drafts with different characters forming the agents and villains. The major plot devices stayed consistent through every draft. ￼
